attribute.name: focused-style
attribute.description: The name of the style for the currently focused item.

attribute.name: title-style
attribute.description: The name of the style for the title of the corresponding Screen.

attribute.name: label-style
attribute.description: The name of the style for the label of the corresponding Item.

attribute.name: columns
attribute.description: The number of columns. This can be used to layout the items in a table.

attribute.name: columns-width
attribute.description: Either "normal", "equal" or the width for each column in a comma separated list (e.g. "columns-width: 60,60,10").

attribute.name: icon-image
attribute.description: The URL of the image. The keyword %INDEX% can be used for adding the position of the icon to the name, e.g."icon-image: url(icon%INDEX%.png);".

attribute.name: icon-image-align
attribute.description: The position of the image relative to the text.

attribute.name: choice-color
attribute.description: The color in which the check- or radio-box will be painted.

attribute.name: checkbox-selected
attribute.description: The URL of the image for a selected item. This will be used only when the type of the list or of the choice group is multiple. Default is a simple image drawn in the defined choice-color.

attribute.name: checkbox-plain
attribute.description: The URL of the image for a not-selected item. This will be used only when the type of the list or of the choice group is multiple. Default is a simple image drawn in the defined choice-color. When "none" is given, no image will be drawn for not-selected items. Only the image for selected items will be drawn in that case.

attribute.name: radiobox-selected
attribute.description: The URL of the image for a selected item. This will be used only when the type of the list or of the choice group is exclusive. Default is a simple image drawn in the defined choice-color.

attribute.name: radiobox-plain
attribute.description: The URL of the image for a not-selected item. This will be used only when the type of the list or of the choice group is exclusive. Default is a simple image drawn in the defined choice-color. When "none" is given, no image will be drawn for not-selected items. Only the image for selected items will be drawn in that case.

attribute.name: popup-image
attribute.description: The URL to the image which should be shown in the closed popup-group. Per default a simple dropdown image will be used.

attribute.name: popup-color
attribute.description: The color for the arrow in the dropdown-image of a closed popup-group.

attribute.name: popup-background-color
attribute.description: The color for the background in the dropdown-image of a closed popup-group.

attribute.name: menubar-color
attribute.description: The color of the menu-bar. This overrides the settings in the predefined style "menu". This attribute is only used, when the "menu" fullscreen setting is activated in the "build.xml" file.

attribute.name: gauge-image
attribute.description: The URL of the image.

attribute.name: gauge-color
attribute.description: The color of the progress bar.

attribute.name: gauge-width
attribute.description: The width of the progress bar.

attribute.name: gauge-height
attribute.description: The height of the progress bar.

attribute.name: gauge-mode
attribute.description: In the continuous mode only the gauge-color will be used, whereas the chunked mode intersects the indicator in chunks. The setting is ignored when an image is provided.

attribute.name: gauge-gap-color
attribute.description: The color of gaps between single chunks. Only used in the "chunked" gauge-mode or when a gauge with an indefinite range is used. In the latter case the provided color will be used to indicate the idle state.

attribute.name: gauge-gap-width
attribute.description: The width of gaps in pixels between single chunks. Only used in the "chunked" gauge-mode.

attribute.name: gauge-chunk-width
attribute.description: The width of single chunks in pixels. Only used in the "chunked" gauge-mode.

attribute.name: gauge-show-value
attribute.description: Determines whether the current value should be shown.

attribute.name: gauge-value-align
attribute.description: Defines where the current value of the gauge should be displayed.

attribute.name: textfield-width
attribute.description: The minimum width of the textfield-element in pixels.

attribute.name: textfield-height
attribute.description: The minimum height of the textfield-element in pixels. Defaults to the height of the used font.

attribute.name: textfield-direct-input
attribute.description: Defines whether input should be done with with J2ME Polish only instead of with the native input-system of the underlying OS.

attribute.name: textfield-caret-color
attribute.description: Defines the color of the caret. This defaults to the color of the text (font-color).

attribute.name: textfield-caret-char
attribute.description: Defines the character which is used to indicate the possible editing. The default character is |.

attribute.name: textfield-show-length
attribute.description: Defines whether the current length of the input should be shown.

attribute.name: datefield-width
attribute.description: The minimum width of the datefield-element in pixels.

attribute.name: datefield-height
attribute.description: The minimum height of the datefield-element in pixels. Defaults to the height of the used font.

attribute.name: ticker-step
attribute.description: The number of pixels by which the ticker is shifted at each update.

attribute.name: scrollindicator-color
attribute.description: The color of the item which indicates that the user can scroll the current screen.

attribute.name: show-text-in-title
attribute.description: Defines whether a list should show the text of the list-items in the title instead on the screen.

attribute.name: font-bitmap
attribute.description: Defines which bitmap (bmf) font should be used.

attribute.name: view-type
attribute.description: Defines which view should be used for showing the items of a Form, List, etc.

attribute.name: droppingview-repeat-animation
attribute.appliesTo: Container, Form, List, ChoiceGroup, The dropping view-type
attribute.description: Defines whether the animation should be repeated each time the screen is shown.

attribute.name: droppingview-speed
attribute.appliesTo: Container, Form, List, ChoiceGroup, The dropping view-type
attribute.description: Defines the speed in pixels per animation-step of the falling items.

attribute.name: droppingview-maximum
attribute.appliesTo: Container, Form, List, ChoiceGroup, The dropping view-type
attribute.description: Defines the maximum bouncing height of the falling items.

attribute.name: droppingview-damping
attribute.appliesTo: Container, Form, List, ChoiceGroup, The dropping view-type
attribute.description: The value by which the maximum is decreased for each following item. By having a damping, the top items seem to bounce higher than lower ones.

attribute.name: droppingview-maxperiode
attribute.appliesTo: Container, Form, List, ChoiceGroup, The dropping view-type
attribute.description: The maximum allowed number of bounces.

attribute.name: shuffleview-repeat-animation
attribute.appliesTo: Container, Form, List, ChoiceGroup, The shuffle view-type
attribute.description: Defines whether the animation should be repeated each time the screen is shown.

attribute.name: shuffleview-speed
attribute.appliesTo: Container, Form, List, ChoiceGroup, The shuffle view-type
attribute.description: Defines the speed in pixels per animation-step of the items.

attribute.name: tabbar-scrolling-indicator-color
attribute.description: Defines the color of the scrolling indicator of the tabbar.

attribute.name: menubar-select-image
attribute.description: Defines the image-URL for the select-image of the extended menubar.

attribute.name: menubar-cancel-image
attribute.description: Defines the image-URL for the cancel-image of the extended menubar.

attribute.name: menubar-options-image
attribute.description: Defines the image-URL for the options-image of the extended menubar.

attribute.name: menubar-show-image-and-text
attribute.description: Determines whether the text should be shown as well in the menubar, when an image has been defined for the corresponding action.

attribute.name: foreground-image
attribute.description: The url of the image that should be shown at the topmost layer. You can also set the foreground-x and forground-y positions.

attribute.name: foreground-x
attribute.description: The x position of the foreground image.

attribute.name: foreground-y
attribute.description: The y position of the foreground image.

attribute.name: exclusiveview-arrow-color
attribute.description: The color of the arrows.

attribute.name: exclusiveview-right-arrow
attribute.description: The URL of the right arrow image.

attribute.name: exclusiveview-left-arrow
attribute.description: The URL of the left arrow image.

attribute.name: min-width
attribute.appliesTo: Item, StringItem, ChoiceGroup, Container, ChoiceItem, IconItem, ImageItem, CustomItem, DateField, TextField, Gauge, ListItem, SpriteItem, Ticker
attribute.description: The minimum width of an item.

attribute.name: max-width
attribute.appliesTo: Item, StringItem, ChoiceGroup, Container, ChoiceItem, IconItem, ImageItem, CustomItem, DateField, TextField, Gauge, ListItem, SpriteItem, Ticker
attribute.description: The maximum width of an item.

attribute.name: scale-factor
attribute.description: The factor in percent by which the image should be scaled, e.g. 200.

attribute.name: scale-steps
attribute.description: The number of intermediate steps that should be used for scaling an image.

attribute.name: screen-change-animation
attribute.description: An effect that should be shown whenever the screen is changed.

attribute.name: left-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The speed of the animation.

attribute.name: right-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The speed of the animation.

attribute.name: top-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The speed of the animation.

attribute.name: bottom-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The speed of the animation.

attribute.name: left-shutter-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The speed of the animation.

attribute.name: left-shutter-screen-change-animation-color
attribute.description: The color of the animation.

attribute.name: right-shutter-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The speed of the animation.

attribute.name: right-shutter-screen-change-animation-color
attribute.description: The color of the animation.

attribute.name: top-shutter-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The speed of the animation.

attribute.name: top-shutter-screen-change-animation-color
attribute.description: The color of the animation.

attribute.name: bottom-shutter-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The speed of the animation.

attribute.name: bottom-shutter-screen-change-animation-color
attribute.description: The color of the animation.

attribute.name: flash-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The speed of the animation.

attribute.name: flash-screen-change-animation-color
attribute.description: The color of the animation.

attribute.name: vertical-flash-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The speed of the animation.

attribute.name: vertical-flash-screen-change-animation-color
attribute.description: The color of the animation.

attribute.name: scrollup-screen-change-animation-speed
attribute.description: The speed of the animation.

attribute.name: scrollup-screen-change-animation-color
attribute.description: The color of the animation.
